content: DUBLIN  Aug 24 CRH  has sold its U.S. distribution business to Beacon Roofing Supply Inc. for $2.63 billion in cash and will use the proceeds for acquisitions elsewhere  the Irish building materials group said on Thursday.
name: Beacon Roofing Supply Inc
title: CRH sells U.S. distribution arm to Beacon Roofing for $2.6 billion

content: Beacon Roofing Supply Inc  will buy roofing products distributor Roofing Supply Group in a deal valued at about $1.1 billion  to expand in key housing markets of California  Florida and Texas.
name: Beacon Roofing Supply Inc
title: Beacon to buy Roofing Supply  expands in key housing markets

content: July 27 Beacon Roofing Supply Inc said it would buy roofing products distributor Roofing Supply Group from investment firm Clayton  Dubilier & Rice in a deal valued at $1.1 billion.
name: Beacon Roofing Supply Inc
title: Beacon to buy Roofing Supply Group in $1.1 bln deal
